summary: "Deadwood" is a Western TV show that aired on HBO from 2004 to 2006. Set in the 1870s in Deadwood, South Dakota, it tells the story of the town's growth. Created by David Milch, the show features real historical figures like Seth Bullock and Al Swearengen. It won many awards and is considered one of the best TV shows ever. In 2019, a movie sequel, "Deadwood: The Movie," was released, taking place ten years after the series ended.
title: Deadwood (TV series)
